title: BBQ Thai Style Chicken
ingredients: ['1 bunch fresh coriander with roots', '3 cloves garlic, peeled', '3 small hot red chillies, seeded and chopped', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1 pinch salt', '3 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 (1.3kg) chicken, cut into pieces', '60ml coconut milk']
